name: Army Commando: Counter Strike
description:
Army Commando: Counter Strike Mission is new fast pace 3d commando fps adventure. It is commando fighting in street war game; army commando will fight the enemy in the city now. The combat war is not on the frontline but the unique nature of this game is the realistic 3d city graphics.
Features:
• Modern Special Weapons for Shooting.
• Different Amazing Missions.
• Smooth & Easy Controls.
• Realistic Environment & Sounds.
• High quality 3D Graphics & Mode.
